titles.title: Passport Recovery Assistance Act of 2011
Passport Recovery Assistance Act of 2011
To amend the Passport Act of 1920 to waive the collection of passport fees to replace passports that were lost, damaged, or destroyed as a result of major disasters or emergencies.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

bill.summary: Passport Recovery Assistance Act of 2011 - Amends the Passport Act of 1920 to waive the passport fee for an individual whose unexpired passport was lost, damaged, or destroyed as a result of a major disaster or emergency.
